communications.subject: South Carolina Public Records Law Request: South Carolina State Employees (2013 - 2018)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the South Carolina Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Monthly electronic listings of all employees of the South Carolina Executive Branch from January 2013 through December 2018. Specifically, I am seeking electronic listings of all individuals employed within all state agencies, commissions, and departments for each month from January 2013 through December 2018.

This is a copy of my earlier request sent on 11-27-2022 --- just with earlier dates. In particular, I would like the following fields for each month from January 2013 - December 2018: 

- First Name
- Middle Name
- Last Name
- Suffix
- Final Payrate
- Agency Name
- Class Title
- Position Title
- Ethnic Origin
- Gender
- Age
- Employee Group
- State Hire Date
- County Name

If you cannot produce any of these fields for this period, please let me know and generate only the available variables.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Goehring

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records generated between 2009 and 2014 mentioning or describing the hacker group RevoluSec.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Emma North-Best
